com.marist.mscs721

Class RoomScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marist.mscs721.RoomScheduler

  • public class RoomScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to launch the main menu to process room schedules.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Elliott Picker

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for execution

        Displays main menu in loop until boolean end is set

        Parameters:

      • listSchedule

        protected static void listSchedule(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        Prints out the meetings associated with a given room

        Calls getRoomName to prompt for a room name. Locates the room and prints it's schedule

        Parameters:
        roomList - an ArrayList containing the room to be displayed

      • mainMenu

        protected static int mainMenu()
        Displays main menu and waits for user input
        Returns:
        the specified option as an int entered by user

      • addRoom

        protected static java.lang.String addRoom(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        Prompts user for details of a new room and adds it to roomList array
        Parameters:
        roomList - an array of rooms to add the newly created room to
        Returns:
        Message indicating the room was added successfully

      • removeRoom

        protected static java.lang.String removeRoom(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        Removes a room from a list of rooms

        Calls getRoomName to prompt user for room name and remove it from given list

        Parameters:
        roomList - the list of rooms from which user enterred room is to be removed from
        Returns:
        String indicating whether or not room was removed

      • listRooms

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        String indicating number of rooms

      • importRoomData

        protected static java.util.ArrayList<Room> importRoomData(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomListOld)
        Reads in roomList from external json file

        Opens roomscheduler.json and converts to arraylist of rooms

        Parameters:
        roomListOld - the list of rooms to return if roomscheudler.json cannot be opened
        Returns:
        either the roomList read in from file or the roomList passed in if file could not be opened

      • exportRoomData

        protected static java.lang.String exportRoomData(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        Exports roomList array to json file
        Parameters:
        roomList - an array of rooms to be written to file
        Returns:
        Message indicating whether the room was exported successfully or not

      • scheduleRoom

        protected static java.lang.String scheduleRoom(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        Prompts user for details of a meetings and adds it for a given room
        Parameters:
        roomList - an array of rooms containing the room for which a meeting is to be scheduled
        Returns:
        Message indicating whether the meeting was scheduled successfully or not

      • getRoomFromName

        protected static Room getRoomFromName(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                      java.lang.String name)
        Returns a room object of given name
        Parameters:
        roomList - an array of rooms to search for given room name
        name - A string representing the name of the room to be searched for
        Returns:
        Room object of given name if found otherwise null

      • findRoomIndex

        protected static int findRoomIndex(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                   java.lang.String roomName)
        Returns index of given room in a roomlist or else returns roomlist size

        It is neccessary to either check if the room exists either through doesRoomExist method or else check if returns index equal to roomList size

        Parameters:
        roomList - an array of rooms to search for given room name
        roomName - A string representing the name of the room to be searched for
        Returns:
        index in roomList of roomName or else the size of the roomList

      • getRoomName

        protected static java.lang.String getRoomName()
        Prompts user for a room name
        Returns:
        String captured from keyboard input to be used as a room name

      • doesRoomExist

        protected static boolean doesRoomExist(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                       java.lang.String roomName)
        Checks if the given room name exists within the passed room list
        Parameters:
        roomList - an array of rooms to search for given room name
        roomName - A string representing the name of the room to be searched for
        Returns:
        true if roomname is the name of a room in roomlist, otherwise false
